mapper.sql: itemID, itemCode, DATA_TITLE, DATA_LOCATION, DATA_AUTHOR, DATA_SOURCE, DATA_FILE_TYPE, DATA_DELAYED_RELEASE, DATA_STATUS, DATA_TYPE, RELEASE_OR_NOT, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt

cr.itemID, cr.itemCode, cr.DATA_TITLE, cr.DATA_LOCATION, cr.DATA_AUTHOR, cr.DATA_SOURCE, cr.DATA_FILE_TYPE, cr.DATA_DELAYED_RELEASE, cr.DATA_STATUS, cr.DATA_TYPE, cr.RELEASE_OR_NOT, cr.CREATER, cr.itemCreateAt, cr.UPDATER, cr.itemUpdateAt
mapper.select:
select
,
, cf.FILE_PATH, cf.FILE_NAME from tb_culpro_data cr left join tb_culpro_file cf on cr.itemCode = cf.DATA_CODE where DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DATA_LOCATION = ""
and DATA_STATUS in (2,4,5,7)
and DATA_STATUS in (1,2,3)
and DATA_STATUS in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7)
order by cr.itemUpdateAt desc

select
,
, cf.FILE_PATH, cf.FILE_NAME from tb_culpro_data cr left join tb_culpro_file cf on cr.itemCode = cf.DATA_CODE where DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DATA_LOCATION != ""
and DATA_STATUS in (2,4,5,7)
and DATA_STATUS in (1,2,3)
and DATA_STATUS in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7)
order by cr.itemUpdateAt desc

update tb_culpro_data
DATA_TITLE = #{dataTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LOCATION = #{dataLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_AUTHOR = #{dataAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_SOURCE = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

,
FROM tb_culpro_data order by itemUpdateAt desc

select a.DATA_TITLE, a.itemID, a.itemCode from tb_culpro_data a inner join (select itemID from tb_culpro_data where DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DATA_STATUS = 5 order by itemUpdateAt limit 0,5) b on a.itemID=b.itemID;
